objectdetection
Class ObstacleDetector

java.lang.Object
  objectdetection.ObstacleDetector

public class ObstacleDetector
extends java.lang.Object

This is a class used to perform the pass scanning of the next tile of the path

Author:
Peter Henderson

limitedSafeScan

public boolean limitedSafeScan()
scans only 70 degrees directly in front of the robot

Returns:

scanTileWithSideSensors

public boolean scanTileWithSideSensors()
This method scans the tile immediately in front of it. It assumes that the robot is align straight facing the tile and does not scan the surrounding tiles. This method also checks two side ultrasonic sensors attached to the remote brick

Returns:

scanTile

public boolean scanTile()
This method scans the tile immediately in front of it. It assumes that the robot is align straight facing the tile and does not scan the surrounding tiles

Returns:
